options.name: Free Action : Shield Bash
options.description: After making a Successful Melee Attack with a 1 Handed Weapon, you slam the same Target with your Shield, adding 1d6 Damage to your Attack.

options.name: Quick Guard
options.description: You can use a Block Check against Ray Attacks instead of your Resistance.

options.name: Savage Shield Bash
options.description: Your Shield Bash Damage becomes equal to your Strength Bonus Modifier.

options.name: Reaction : Cover
options.description: In response to an Ally that is Adjacent to you being Targeted by an Attack that is eligible to be Blocked, you make a Block Check for that Ally.

options.name: Shield Guardian
options.description: Gain +1 Block while wielding a Shield

options.name: Reaction : Spellshield
options.description: In response to being Targeted with a Spell, you gain a 1d4 Bonus to your Block Check. If a Line, Projectile or Cone Spell was successfully blocked, all Creatures within a 4 Unit Cone who are behind you in relation to the Direction of the Spell only take Splash Damage if they fail their Checks.

options.name: Dazing Shield
options.description: When you hit a Creature with the Shield Bash ability, they must make a Concentration against Half the Damage after Mitigation or become Dazed. If the initial Attack that prompted the Shield bash was a True Hit, the Target becomes Stunned instead if they fail.
